member.name: T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress
member.summary: Represents a civic address. A civic address can include fields such as street address, postal code, state/province, and country or region.

member.name: M:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using address information.
member.param: A string containing the first line of the street address.
A string containing the second line of the street address.
A string containing the building name or number.
A string containing the city.
A string containing the country or region.
A string containing the floor number.
A string containing the postal code.
A string containing the state or province.
member.exception: At least one parameter must be a non-empty string.

member.name: P:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.AddressLine1
member.summary: Gets or sets the first line of the address.
member.returns: Returns the first line of the address. If the data is not provided, returns .

member.summary: Gets or sets the second line of the address.
member.returns: Returns the second line of the address. If the data is not provided, returns

member.returns: Returns the building name or number. If the data is not provided, returns .

member.returns: Returns the name of the city. If the data is not provided, returns .

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the contains data.

member.name: P:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.PostalCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the postal code of the location.

member.name: P:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.StateProvince
member.summary: Gets or sets the state or province of the location.

member.name: T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver
member.summary: Provides functionality for resolving a coordinate-based location to a civic address.

member.name: M:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)
member.summary: Synchronously resolves a civic address from a location based on latitude and longitude. This call will block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
member.returns: The civic address that is resolved from the parameter. is returned if the address cannot be resolved.
member.param: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.
member.exception: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

member.name: M:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)
member.summary: Resolves an address asynchronously from a location that is based on latitude and longitude. The call does not block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
member.param: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.
member.exception: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

member.name: E:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when the address resolution that was initiated by a call to completes.

member.name: T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate
member.summary: Represents a geographical location that is determined by latitude and longitude coordinates. May also include altitude, accuracy, speed, and course information.

member.name: M:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of that has no data fields set.

member.name: M:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from latitude and longitude data.
member.param: The latitude of the location. May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
The longitude of the location. May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
member.exception: Latitude or longitude is out of range.

member.name: M:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from latitude, longitude, and altitude data.
member.param: Latitude. May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
Longitude. May range from -180.0 to 180.0
The altitude in meters. May be negative, 0, positive, or , if unknown.

member.name: M:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from latitude, longitude, altitude, horizontal accuracy, vertical accuracy, speed, and course.
member.param: The latitude of the location. May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
The longitude of the location. May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
The altitude in meters. May be negative, 0, positive, or , if unknown.
The accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates, in meters. Must be greater than or equal to 0. If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the property will be set to .
The accuracy of the altitude, in meters. Must be greater than or equal to 0. If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the property will be set to .
The speed measured in meters per second. May be negative, 0, positive, or , if unknown. A negative speed can indicate moving in reverse.
The direction of travel, rather than orientation. This parameter is measured in degrees relative to true north. Must range from 0 to 360.0, or be .

member.summary: Gets or sets the heading in degrees, relative to true north.

member.exception: is set outside the valid range.

member.summary: Optimize for power, performance, and other cost considerations.

member.summary: Deliver the most accurate report possible. This includes using services that might charge money, or consuming higher levels of battery power or connection bandwidth.

member.summary: Location permissions are not known. This status can occur while the provider is being initialized.

member.summary: Location permissions are granted.

member.summary: A location provider is ready to supply new data.

member.name: F:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Initializing
member.summary: The location provider is initializing. For example, a GPS that is still obtaining a fix has this status.

member.name: F:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.NoData
member.summary: No location data is available from any location provider.

member.name: F:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled
member.summary: The location provider is disabled. On Windows 7, this is the case when the Sensor and Location platform has been disabled by group policy.
